--0-123750731-1201892503=:70620
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=iso-8859-1
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 8bit

How many members here would be interested in starting a sister RPG to branch off of NBW? Sometime ago I started the story arc of having a third Great War break out on Cybertron between the Maximals and Predacons as well as any remaining Autobots and Decepticons. Plus there is the G2 Decepticons attacking future Earth. I figure we could do a RPG set in either of these battles. This would allow for new characters to be created and bring the NBW universe to a wider scale.
   
  I like the idea of having it mostly based on Cybertron with maybe little threads branching off to the G2 conflict on Earth.
   
  I would put the RPG on Yahoo groups and have it run the exact same way as NBW.
   
  So get back to me. Who wants the Neo Cybertron Wars RPG?

       
---------------------------------
